title: The Shaikahan

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Shaikahan is a lionlike creature that prowls the eastern jungle of Karamja (usually south of fairy ring DKP) and is involved in the Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest, where the player must help Tamayu defeat it. According to Tamayu, it is very agile, and possesses extreme regenerative abilities, making it difficult to fight under normal circumstances[1]. He describes it standing as tall as a man, with fore claws sharp enough to rip through metal, and with glowing eyes that "burn the embers of death".[2] He also claims it to be 'a source of indescribable evil' and 'a beast more foul than your dreams could imagine' that hunts in the jungle for anyone 'foolish enough' to come across it.[3] Swan Song reveals that the Wise Old Man encountered and defeated it at some point in recent history.

The Shaikahan is a lionlike creature that prowls the eastern jungle of Karamja (usually south of fairy ring DKP) and is involved in the Tai Bwo Wannai Trio quest, where the player must help Tamayu defeat it. According to Tamayu, it is very agile, and possesses extreme regenerative abilities, making it difficult to fight under normal circumstances[1]. He describes it standing as tall as a man, with fore claws sharp enough to rip through metal, and with glowing eyes that "burn the embers of death".[2] He also claims it to be 'a source of indescribable evil' and 'a beast more foul than your dreams could imagine' that hunts in the jungle for anyone 'foolish enough' to come across it.[3] Swan Song reveals that the Wise Old Man encountered and defeated it at some point in recent history.

The Shaikahan is immune to all damage except for karambwan-tipped spears, poison and recoil. These methods are the only way to damage the Shaikahan before and after the quest is complete. It has a unique drop of Shaikahan bones, which give 25 Prayer experience when buried.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • In the Monkey Madness I quest, a monkey that the player rescues from the Ardougne Zoo occasionally has a nightmare about the Shaikahan.
  • The Shaikahan does not appear on the minimap.
  • Its name could be a reference to The Jungle Book tiger Shere Khan.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Tamayu, "Tai Bwo Wannai Trio", Old School RuneScape. "I simply cannot match the Shaikahan's agility! I cannot do enough damage with this spear... ... and it seems to be healing too quickly!"
  2. ^ Tamayu, "Tai Bwo Wannai Trio", Old School RuneScape. "It stands a full man's length in height. Its fore claws are sharp enough to rip through metal. In its eyes glow the embers of death."
  3. ^ Tamayu, "Tai Bwo Wannai Trio", Old School RuneScape. "A source of indescribable evil. A beast more foul than your dreams could imagine. It hunts the jungle for anything foolish enough to cross its path."

'''The Shaikahan''' is a lionlike creature that prowls the eastern jungle of [[Karamja]] (usually south of [[fairy ring]] {{fairycode|DKP}}) and is involved in the [[Tai Bwo Wannai Trio]] quest, where the player must help [[Tamayu]] defeat it. According to Tamayu, it is very agile, and possesses extreme regenerative abilities, making it difficult to fight under normal circumstances{{CiteNPC|npc=Tamayu|loc=Tai Bwo Wannai Trio|quote=I simply cannot match the Shaikahan's agility! I cannot do enough damage with this spear... ... and it seems to be healing too quickly!}}. He describes it standing as tall as a man, with fore claws sharp enough to rip through metal, and with glowing eyes that "''burn the embers of death''".{{CiteNPC|npc=Tamayu|loc=Tai Bwo Wannai Trio|quote=It stands a full man's length in height. Its fore claws are sharp enough to rip through metal. In its eyes glow the embers of death.}} He also claims it to be 'a source of indescribable evil' and 'a beast more foul than your dreams could imagine' that hunts in the jungle for anyone 'foolish enough' to come across it.{{CiteNPC|npc=Tamayu|loc=Tai Bwo Wannai Trio|quote=A source of indescribable evil. A beast more foul than your dreams could imagine. It hunts the jungle for anything foolish enough to cross its path.}} [[Swan Song]] reveals that the [[Wise Old Man]] encountered and defeated it at some point in recent history.

The Shaikahan is immune to all damage except for [[karambwan paste|karambwan-tipped]] [[spear]]s, poison and recoil. These methods are the only way to damage the Shaikahan before and after the quest is complete. It has a unique drop of [[Shaikahan bones]], which give 25 [[Prayer]] experience when buried.

==Trivia==
